word: \n     Money is tied up in Battle Creek that is greatly needed in the Southern field and in other needy places. Many years have passed since the word of the Lord came to us, \"Go ye therefore, and teach all nations.\" Why is there such a determined refusal to obey this word? Clearly and distinctly are the directions given. \"Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you.\"
